<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Subscription revenues in the United States and Canada, as shown on this table, also include subscription and
	other types of game revenues generated in other countries and markets managed by Gravity Interactive. For Ragnarok Online, the countries serviced by Gravity Interactive include the United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and India, include
	Singapore and Malaysia since October&nbsp;24, 2013, the Philippines and 13 Middle East countries including UAE and Saudi Arabia since January&nbsp;1, 2015, and further include 13 East European countries including Russia and Armenia, as well as 11
	South American countries including Chile and Peru, since November&nbsp;16, 2015. Upon these changes, the revenues from Ragnarok Online generated in Singapore and Malaysia through October&nbsp;23, 2013, the Philippines and 13 Middle East countries
	through December&nbsp;31, 2014, and 13 East European countries and 11 South American countries through November&nbsp;15, 2015, are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Royalties and license fees&#151;Others and those generated on or after
	October&nbsp;24, 2013,&nbsp;January&nbsp;1, 2015 and November&nbsp;16, 2015, respectively, are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Subscription revenue&#151;United States/Canada.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online II is serviced by Gravity Interactive worldwide except Indonesia and China, the Philippines prior to
	April&nbsp;1, 2014, Brazil prior to April&nbsp;1, 2014, Singapore prior to November&nbsp;4, 2014, Malaysia prior to November&nbsp;4, 2014 and Vietnam and Thailand prior to July&nbsp;28, 2015
<B>
<I>
	.
</I>
</B>
	Subscription revenues from Ragnarok Online
	II generated from the countries and markets managed by Gravity Interactive are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Subscription revenue&#151;United States/Canada. The revenues from Ragnarok Online II generated from the Philippines, Brazil, Singapore,
	Malaysia, Vietnam and Thailand on and after the relevant date when Gravity Interactive began to service such countries are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Subscription revenue&#151;United States/Canada and those revenues from such countries before
	such relevant date are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Royalties and license fees&#151;Others. However, the revenues from Ragnarok Online II generated from Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Subscription
	revenue&#151;Others, even though Gravity Interactive manages Ragnarok Online II service in such markets. For R.O.S.E. Online, the countries managed by Gravity Interactive include the United&nbsp;States, Canada, Mexico and 40 other countries. For
	Dragonica, the countries serviced by Gravity Interactive include the United States and Canada, and further includes South America except for Brazil since October&nbsp;28, 2013. Gravity Interactive began to service Dragonica globally on
	January&nbsp;1, 2015 but it entered into a sublicense agreement with a local licensee in Thailand for service of Dragonica on October&nbsp;1, 2015, which granted such local licensee the right to service Dragonica in Thailand from February&nbsp;11,
	2016. All revenues from Dragonica for the period covered by the table above are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Subscription revenue&#151;United States/Canada. Requiem is serviced worldwide by Gravity Interactive except for Russia, Armenia and 13
	other countries serviced by Ingamba, a sub-licensee of Gravity Interactive, and the revenues from Requiem generated from the countries directly serviced by Gravity Interactive are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Subscription revenue&#151;United
	States/Canada and those generated from the countries serviced by Ingamba are shown as Online game revenue&#151;Royalties and license fees&#151;Others.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	OUR PRODUCTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We currently categorize our products into three categories: online games; mobile games and applications; and other games and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	game-related
</FONT>
	products and services, including
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	character-based
</FONT>
	merchandise and animation. Revenues from our principal product, Ragnarok Online, accounted for 41.5% of our total
	revenues in 2015, compared with 40.1% of our total revenues in 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Online games
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Online game is a genre of computer games in which a large number of players interact with one another within a virtual game
	world.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	29
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notes:
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The actual date of commercial launch of games in each jurisdiction is dependent on a variety of factors,
	including technical viability and durability, availability of
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-house
</FONT>
	development capability, market conditions, beta testing results and availability of licensing partners, among others.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	MMORPG is an abbreviation for Massively Multiplayer Online Role-playing Game.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Dragonica is commercially offered in the United States, Canada and South America except for Brazil under the
	name Dragon Saga.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	We acquired an aggregate of 50.83% equity interest in Gravity Games, formerly known as Barunson Interactive,
	which developed Dragonica, on October&nbsp;21, 2010, and subsequently increased our ownership in Gravity Games to 85.5% in August 2013.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Dragonica was initially launched in China in February 2009 followed by certain other countries and markets
	under license agreements between Gravity Games and local publishers before our acquisition of Gravity Games.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(6)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	We acquired an aggregate of 88.15% equity interest in TriggerSoft, which developed R.O.S.E. Online, in April
	and May 2005. TriggerSoft was liquidated in October 2007.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Ragnarok Online
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	As of March&nbsp;31, 2016, Ragnarok Online is commercially offered in Korea and 80 other countries and markets since its
	commercial launch in August 2002. See ITEM&nbsp;4.B. &#147;BUSINESS OVERVIEW&#151;OUR MARKETS&#151;Overseas markets.&#148; Ragnarok Online represented 41.5% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;14,803&nbsp;million (US$12,660&nbsp;thousand) in 2015,
	compared with 40.1% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;15,985&nbsp;million in 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	30
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notes:
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	For convenience only, the Won amounts are expressed in U.S.&nbsp;dollars at the rate of Won&nbsp;1,169.26 to
	US$1.00, the noon buying rate in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2015 as certified by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York for customs purposes.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Includes subscription and other types of game revenues managed by Gravity Interactive and generated in
	Australia, New Zealand and India, and Singapore and Malaysia since October&nbsp;24, 2013, the Philippines and 13 Middle East countries including UAE and Saudi Arabia since January&nbsp;1, 2015, and further include 13 East European countries
	including Russia and Armenia, as well as 11 South American countries including Chile and Peru, since November&nbsp;16, 2015. Such revenues from other countries constitute a minor portion of the revenues recorded as subscription revenues from the
	United States and Canada.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok Online game service in China by Shengqu Information Technology (Shanghai)&nbsp;Co.,&nbsp;Ltd., our
	former licensee, ceased on December&nbsp;30, 2011. We relaunched the game in China with Beijing Kunlun Online Network Tech&nbsp;Co.,&nbsp;Ltd., our current licensee, on February&nbsp;28, 2013 and ceased to offer Ragnarok Online in China on
	February&nbsp;29, 2016.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Our license agreement with Level UP! Inc. for Ragnarok Online game service in the Philippines was terminated
	on March&nbsp;31, 2015, and we subsequently amended our license agreement for Ragnarok Online games service with Gravity Interactive to include the Philippines as a service country of Gravity Interactive. Upon these changes, the revenues generated
	in the Philippines through March&nbsp;31, 2015 are shown as Online games&#151;royalties and license fees&#151; Philippines and those generated from April&nbsp;1, 2015 are shown as Online games&#151;subscription revenue&#151;United States/Canada.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Our license agreement with Game Flier (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd. for Ragnarok Online game service in Singapore and
	Malaysia expired on October&nbsp;9, 2013 and we subsequently amended our license agreement for Ragnarok Online games service with Gravity Interactive on October&nbsp;24, 2013 to include such countries as service countries of Gravity Interactive.
	Upon these changes, the revenues generated in Singapore and Malaysia through October&nbsp;9, 2013 are shown as Online games&#151;royalties and license fees&#151;Singapore/Malaysia and those generated from October&nbsp;24, 2013 are shown as Online
	games&#151;subscription revenue&#151;United States/Canada.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:10.0PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;WIDTH:26%">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notes:
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	&#147;PCU,&#148; or peak concurrent users, represents the highest number of users of Ragnarok Online during
	the specified time period as recorded on the servers for the various countries.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	&#147;ACU,&#148; or average concurrent users, represents the average number of concurrent users of Ragnarok
	Online during the specified time period as recorded on the servers for the various countries.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We believe
	that the number of users as measured by PCU or ACU (i)&nbsp;is reflective of our active user base and (ii)&nbsp;is correlated to revenues as revenues from an online game depend on the number of users as well as time spent playing the game. We
	believe such correlation has been reflected in the decrease of our revenues generated from Ragnarok Online in recent years, although there are also other factors which contribute to an increase or a decrease of revenues from a game. PCU and ACU are
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-financial
</FONT>
	variables and the data presented has not been audited or reviewed. Other companies may determine PCU or ACU differently than we do.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We obtained an exclusive license from
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Mr.&nbsp;Myoung-Jin
</FONT>
	Lee to use the storyline and
	characters from his cartoon titled &#147;Ragnarok&#148; for the development of games including for animation and character merchandising. We paid Mr.&nbsp;Lee an initial license fee of Won&nbsp;40&nbsp;million and are required to pay royalties based
	on a percentage of adjusted revenues (net of
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	value-added
</FONT>
	taxes and certain other expenses) or net income generated from the use of the Ragnarok brand through January 2033.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online is an action
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	adventure-based
</FONT>
	MMORPG that combines
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	cartoon-like
</FONT>
	characters,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	community-oriented
</FONT>
	themes and combat features in a virtual world within which thousands of players can interact with one another. By combining highly
	interactive and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	community-oriented
</FONT>
	themes and features, such as marriages and organization of guilds, we believe we are able to create user loyalty from our users who favor games that provide social
	interaction in a virtual setting.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Other key features of Ragnarok Online include the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	players may assume an ongoing role, or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	alter-ego,
</FONT>
	of a particular game
	character, each with different strengths and weaknesses. In Ragnarok Online, the user starts as a &#147;novice&#148; and undergoes training in a specialized mapped game zone to become familiar with the game features. Once that stage is completed,
	the user can choose from six basic characters, each with a distinct combination of different traits;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	as each game character advances in challenge levels up to level&nbsp;175, the character can enter into a
	greater range of mapped game zones and develop into a more sophisticated game character in terms of game attributes and special powers;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok Online characters may visually express the users&#146; mood and emotions by using emotive icons that
	appear within a bubble above the characters&#146; heads. We believe that this feature significantly expands the interface for user interaction and elevates the level of social reality of the game;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	32
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage33"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	game features may be traded or sold within the game, and game characters may simulate
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	real-life
</FONT>
	experiences such as marriage, group fights and joining a guild. In addition, players may communicate with each other through
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-game
</FONT>
	chatting or instant messaging;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	special events are held from time to time to stimulate community formations. For example, we periodically host
	&#147;fortress raids&#148; whereby players are encouraged to organize themselves into a team to compete against other teams to capture a fortress within a set time; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	the game has no preordained ending and is designed to continuously evolve in terms of plots, mapped game zones
	and character attributes through enhancements from time to time.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We believe that the PC configurations
	required to run Ragnarok Online are lower than or similar to many other competing online games, which we believe has facilitated our successful entry into and expansion of Ragnarok Online in many of the developed and developing countries in which
	Ragnarok Online is distributed. The recommended minimum PC configuration for Ragnarok Online is Intel Celeron 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 3000+, 512 MB RAM and 32 MB graphics card.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Ragnarok Online II
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online II, an action
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	adventure-based
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	three-dimensional
</FONT>
	MMORPG, is a sequel to Ragnarok Online with enhanced character and community features. Ragnarok Online II includes
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	pastel-type
</FONT>
	graphics, advanced
	character customization and detailed monsters and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-player
</FONT>
	characters. Ragnarok Online II also adopts
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Mr.&nbsp;Myoung-Jin
</FONT>
	Lee&#146;s original drawings from his comic
	book Ragnarok and music from Kanno Yoko, a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	well-respected
</FONT>
	composer in the animation industry.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We commercially launched Ragnarok Online II in Korea in March 2012, Singapore and Malaysia in January 2013, the United States,
	Canada and 28&nbsp;European countries in May 2013, Indonesia in August 2013, Thailand in October 2013 and Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau in June 2014. Ragnarok Online II game service in Korea was transferred to Gravity Interactive on December&nbsp;24,
	2013 as the game service in Korea was suspended on December&nbsp;23, 2013. Our license and distribution agreement with Gravity Interactive to distribute Ragnarok Online II in the United States, Canada and 28&nbsp;European countries was amended in
	February 2014 to have Gravity Interactive distribute Ragnarok Online&nbsp;II globally except for Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Japan, the Philippines, Vietnam, Brazil and China. In April 2014, such agreement with Gravity Interactive was
	further amended to have Gravity Interactive distribute Ragnarok Online&nbsp;II globally except for Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, Japan and China, which was additionally amended to have Gravity Interactive distribute Ragnarok
	Online II globally except for Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, Japan and China in November 2014. In July 2015, the same license and distribution agreement with Gravity Interactive was amended to have Gravity Interactive distribute Ragnarok
	Online&nbsp;II globally except for Indonesia, Japan and China, and further amended in February 2016 to have Gravity Interactive distribute Ragnarok Online II globally except for Indonesia and China. As a result, Ragnarok Online II is currently
	commercially offered globally except for China and Japan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We have a license and distribution agreement for Ragnarok Online
	II with a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	third-party
</FONT>
	licensee in China. The total value of the license and distribution agreement for Ragnarok Online II with our licensee in China, where the game has not been commercially launched, is
	US$1,500&nbsp;thousand as of the date hereof. Our license and distribution agreements for Ragnarok Online II with licensees in the Philippines and Brazil were terminated on April&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2014. Also, on September&nbsp;11, 2014, we terminated the
	license and distribution agreement with our licensee for service of Ragnarok Online II in Singapore and Malaysia. In addition, the license and distribution agreement with our licensee for service of Ragnarok Online II in Thailand and Vietnam was
	terminated on June&nbsp;1, 2015, and the agreements with our licensees in Japan and Indonesia were terminated on February&nbsp;12, 2016 and April&nbsp;1, 2016, respectively. Under the terms of the termination agreement with our licensee in
	Indonesia, Ragnarok Online 2 will continue to be offered in Indonesia by the current licensee until May 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	33
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage34"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online II represented 3.2% of our total revenues or
	Won&nbsp;1,155&nbsp;million (US$987&nbsp;thousand) in 2015 and 6.8% of our total revenues or Won 2,724&nbsp;million in 2014. See ITEM&nbsp;3.D. &#147;RISK FACTORS&#151;RISKS RELATING TO OUR BUSINESS&#151;If we are unable to consistently and timely
	develop, acquire, license, launch, market or operate commercially successful online and mobile games in addition to Ragnarok Online, our business, financial condition and results of operations may be materially and adversely affected.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Requiem
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Unlike Ragnarok Online and Ragnarok Online II, which do not emphasize violent themes, we designed Requiem to showcase
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	user-to-user
</FONT>
</FONT>
	combat. Requiem provides players with a variety of combat systems, which allow them to accumulate experience and reward points to be used when they buy special
	items designed for combats.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Requiem is currently commercially offered globally by Gravity Interactive. Requiem was
	commercially offered in Russia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Estonia, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Moldova, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Ukraine and Uzbekistan by Ingamba under our license agreement with Ingamba until November
	2013, when our license agreement with Ingamba was terminated, and these countries are included as countries and markets serviced by Gravity Interactive. Gravity Interactive entered into a sublicense agreement with Ingamba in December 2013 to
	distribute Requiem in these countries, which was terminated in December 2015. We also launched a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Web-browser
</FONT>
	based version of Requiem on WarpPortal, Gravity Interactive&#146;s game portal site, and Facebook in
	April 2012 and September 2012, respectively, and ceased offering such services in November 2014. The amount of revenues from Requiem represented less than 1% of our total revenues in 2015, and 1.0% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;379&nbsp;million
	in&nbsp;2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Dragonica (Dragon Saga)
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Dragonica is a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	three-dimensional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	side-scrolling
</FONT>
	MMORPG, which is commercially offered in the United States, Canada and South America except for Brazil under the name Dragon Saga. Dragonica was developed by Gravity Games, our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	85.5%-owned
</FONT>
	subsidiary.
	Dragonica is currently commercially offered globally by Gravity Interactive except for Thailand, where our local licensee has been offering Dragonica since February 2016. The amount of revenues from Dragonica represented 1.1% of our total revenues
	or Won&nbsp;391&nbsp;million (US$334&nbsp;thousand) in 2015, and 1.5% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;597&nbsp;million in 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	R.O.S.E. Online
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	R.O.S.E. Online is a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	three-dimensional
</FONT>
	MMORPG, which is commercially offered in the
	United&nbsp;States, Canada, Mexico, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Ireland, Spain, Sweden, the United Kingdom, Iceland, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Hungary, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta,
	Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Albania, Andorra, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Liechtenstein, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, San Marino, Serbia, Vatican City State, Croatia, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia and Turkey since
	its commercial launch in January 2005. The amount of revenues from R.O.S.E. Online represented less than 1% of our total revenues in each of 2015 and 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Ragnarok Prequel
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Prequel is a Web
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	browser-based
</FONT>
	MMORPG, which is played on a Web browser and
	which does not require any
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	client-side
</FONT>
	software to be installed. In May 2013, we entered into an agreement with Shanghai The Dream Network Technology&nbsp;Co.,&nbsp;Ltd., a Chinese game developer, which was
	granted the right to develop a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Web-browser
</FONT>
	based game based on Ragnarok Online and distribute the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Web-browser
</FONT>
	based game in China under the agreement. Ragnarok Prequel
	was soft launched in China in October 2013, then suspended from October 2014 for additional development and localization, and commercially
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	re-launched
</FONT>
	in May 2015. Ragnarok Prequel represented less than 1% of
	our total revenues in each of 2015 and 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	34
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Mobile games and applications
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	As compared to online games, mobile games, which are played using mobile phones, including smartphones such as Google Android
	compatible phones and the Apple iPhone as well as feature phones, and other mobile devices, such as tablet computers, have shorter game playtimes and less complex
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	user-game
</FONT>
	interactions. We believe that mobile
	games, due to such characteristics, provide
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	less-experienced
</FONT>
	users with a means to become familiar with both game playing and the game culture without making a substantial commitment in time and resources. As
	a result, we believe that mobile games allow us to target a broader audience of users.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We develop mobile games, most of
	which are based on our intellectual property, which include Ragnarok Online&#151;Uprising: Valkyrie, Ragnarok Online Mobile Story and Ragnarok Violet, and also publish mobile games licensed from third parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In contrast to online games, the life cycle of a mobile game is relatively short and generally lasts from 6 to 24&nbsp;months
	while reaching its peak popularity within the first 3&nbsp;months of its introduction, though it varies by genre. As a result, we generate a significant portion of our mobile games revenue from the games that have been released within the recent
	12&nbsp;months.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The following table sets forth each of the mobile games that we have released since January 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	For our smartphone games offered where we directly provide mobile games services to users, we
	share users&#146; payments for
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transactions
</FONT>
	with digital storefront owners and mobile telecommunications operators. For our smartphone games in the other markets where the mobile games services are
	offered by our licensees, we receive license fees and royalty revenues from our licensees.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In addition to mobile games
	offered to users, we also develop mobile applications provided to
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	third-party
</FONT>
	enterprises. The following are revenues generated from our mobile games and applications business for the periods indicated:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Other games and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	game-related
</FONT>
	products and services
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Other games
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In addition to developing and publishing online games and mobile games, which is our primary business, we also provide games
	for game consoles and handheld game consoles, such as Nintendo DS, the Xbox&nbsp;360 and the PlayStation series. Console games are distributed in the form of a disc or cartridge (game card), or downloaded directly to a console through the Internet.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The following table sets forth the console games we have released.

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok DS was initially released in Japan in December 2008 followed by Korea in June 2009 and the United
	States, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, Colombia, Guatemala, Panama and Venezuela in February 2010.
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok Odyssey was initially released in Japan in February 2012 followed by Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong,
	Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia and Thailand in August 2012, the United States, Canada, Mexico and Brazil in October 2012 and Europe in February 2013.
</P>
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok Odyssey Ace for the PlayStation Vita platform was initially released in Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Hong
	Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia and Thailand in August 2013 followed by the United States, Canada, Mexico, Brazil and Europe in April 2014.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok Odyssey Ace for the PlayStation 3 platform was initially released in the United States, Canada,
	Mexico, Brazil and Europe in April 2014 followed by Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia and Thailand in July 2014.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We also provide games for IPTV. In September 2008, we entered into a licensing agreement with Iconix
	Entertainment&nbsp;Co.,&nbsp;Ltd., or &#147;Iconix Entertainment,&#148; to develop and publish Pororo Game, an IPTV game based on Iconix Entertainment&#146;s 3D TV animation series &#147;Pororo: The Little Penguin.&#148; We commercially launched
	Pororo Game in September 2009 and renewed our licensing agreement with Iconix Entertainment in September 2011,&nbsp;September 2012,&nbsp;September 2013,&nbsp;September 2014, and September 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The amount of revenues from console and IPTV games represented 2.0% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;723 million
	(US$618&nbsp;thousand) in 2015, and 2.4% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;941&nbsp;million in 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Game character
	merchandising
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In order to optimize the commercial opportunities presented by our games and their characters, we
	and our licensees have been marketing dolls, stationery, food and other
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	character-based
</FONT>
	merchandise, as well as game manuals, monthly magazines and other publications, based on our games. We currently have
	arrangements with GungHo to license Ragnarok Online&#146;s game characters in Japan, and with AsiaSoft Corporation Public&nbsp;Co.,&nbsp;Ltd. to license Ragnarok Online II game characters in Thailand.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	36
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage37"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The amount of revenues from game character merchandising represented less than 1%
	of our total revenues in each of 2015 and 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Animation
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Gravity Entertainment, our Japanese subsidiary, entered into an agreement with G&amp;G&nbsp;Entertainment Inc. and three other
	Japanese media and entertainment companies for the production and distribution of a 26
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	half-hour
</FONT>
	episode animation series based on the storyline and characters of Ragnarok Online in October 2004. The series
	was produced by Gravity Entertainment and broadcast on television in nine countries from 2004 through 2007. The animation series of Ragnarok Online has been sold in DVD and VOD (video on demand) formats in North America since March 2006, and it has
	also been distributed in Europe. Our revenues from our animation business represented less than 1% of our total revenues in each of 2015 and 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Other services
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	NeoCyon provides Web site development and operation services to third parties in addition to its core mobile games business. In
	addition, we generate revenues from sales of goods related to mobile phones, such as ornamental accessories manufactured or procured by third parties, based on consignment sale agreements with such third parties. The amount of revenues from other
	services represented 8.2% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;2,926 million (US$2,502&nbsp;thousand) in 2015, compared with 8.9% of our total revenues or Won&nbsp;3,560&nbsp;million in 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	OUR MARKETS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Korea, Japan, the United States/Canada, Taiwan/Hong Kong/Macau and China were our biggest geographic markets in 2015 in terms
	of revenue. Each of these markets is serviced either by us or a distribution company. We directly manage online game operations in Korea. We and NeoCyon both directly manage mobile game operations in Korea. Gravity Interactive, our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	wholly-owned
</FONT>
	subsidiary, manages game operations in the United States and Canada, including service for Ragnarok Online, Ragnarok Online II, Requiem, Dragonica and R.O.S.E. Online. For Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau,
	Game Flier International Corporation is our licensee for Ragnarok Online and Gravity Interactive directly provides services for Ragnarok Online II, Requiem, R.O.S.E. Online and Dragonica. GungHo Online Entertainment,&nbsp;Inc. is our licensee for
	Ragnarok Online and Ragnarok Mobile Story in Japan. Shanghai The Dream Network Technology Co., Ltd. is our licensee for Ragnarok Online II and Ragnarok Prequel in China.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The following table sets forth a summary of our consolidated statement of operations showing revenues by geographic area for
	the periods indicated and the percentage represented by such revenues for year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<P STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;BORDER-TOP:3.00PX DOUBLE #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:10.0PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;WIDTH:26%">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notes:
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	For convenience only, the Won amounts are expressed in U.S.&nbsp;dollars at the rate of Won&nbsp;1,169.26 to
	US$1.00, the noon buying rate in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2015 as certified by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York for customs purposes.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	37
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage38"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Revenues in the United States and Canada, as shown on this table, also include subscription and other types of
	game revenues generated in other countries managed by Gravity Interactive. Such revenues from other countries constitute a minor portion of the revenues recorded as subscription revenues from the United States and Canada.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Korea
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In
	Korea, we commercially launched and began to charge users for Ragnarok Online in August 2002, followed by other games. Our online game users in Korea consist of individual PC account users and Internet caf&eacute; subscribers. Individual PC account
	users are individuals who log on to our game servers from places other than Internet caf&eacute;s, such as from home or work, whereas Internet caf&eacute; subscribers are commercial businesses operating Internet caf&eacute; outlets equipped with
	multiple PCs that provide broadband Internet access to their customers who typically prefer to play online games together with their peers with more powerful PC hardware and faster broadband Internet access than they have at home. Most Internet
	caf&eacute;s charge their customers PC usage and Internet access fees of Won&nbsp;973 on average per hour and subscribe to various online games. Over 5,500 Internet caf&eacute;s offered our games in Korea according to our internal data as of each of
	December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014. In order to offer our games, an Internet caf&eacute; typically purchases minimum game hours from us. Subscription fees from Internet caf&eacute;s accounted for 5.8% and 7.6% of our subscription revenues in Korea in
	2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Overseas markets
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online is commercially offered in the following 80 overseas countries and markets: Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau,
	the United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, India, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, the Philippines, Indonesia, Brazil, Russia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Estonia, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Moldova, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan,
	Uzbekistan, France, Belgium, the United Kingdom, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Ireland, Scotland, Denmark, Spain, Austria, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania,
	Slovakia, Slovenia, Switzerland, Turkey, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, Oman, Lebanon, Mauritania, Egypt, Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia, Guyana, Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, Bolivia, Republic of Suriname, Argentina, Ecuador,
	Uruguay, Chile, Colombia, Paraguay, and Peru, as of March&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online is distributed through Gravity
	Interactive except for Japan, Taiwan/Hong Kong/Macau, Thailand, Indonesia, Brazil and 28 European countries and markets in which jurisdictions local licensees publish Ragnarok Online. The following table lists the overseas countries and markets in
	which Ragnarok Online is commercially offered through our licensees, the names of the licensees, the dates of the license agreements, and the commercial launch dates and expiry dates of the license agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The licensing agreement with Game Flier International Corporation was terminated in March 2016. However, we
	and Game Flier International Corporation agreed to offer Ragnarok Online to existing game users in Taiwan/Hong Kong/Macau until June 2016, while we prepare our direct offering of Ragnarok Online in such markets.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The license agreement with AsiaSoft Corporation Public Co., Ltd. was terminated in March 2016. However, we and
	AsiaSoft Corporation Public Co., Ltd. agreed to offer Ragnarok Online in Thailand until June 2016 under the terms of previous agreement. We are currently discussing with other potential local licensees for service of Ragnarok Online in Thailand.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Represents game operations in France, Belgium, the United Kingdom, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Ireland, Scotland,
	Denmark, Spain, Austria, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Switzerland and Turkey.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Ragnarok Online was initially launched in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Italy and Turkey with a different
	licensee in April 2004.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Ragnarok Online II is currently commercially offered globally excluding China
	and Japan. Requiem and Dragonica are currently commercially offered worldwide. R.O.S.E. Online is currently commercially offered in the United States, Canada, Mexico and 40 other countries. While most of our mobile games are commercially offered in
	Korea, we also provide those developed
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-house
</FONT>
	in overseas countries, including the United States, Japan and Taiwan, among others. See ITEM&nbsp;4.B. &#147;BUSINESS OVERVIEW&#151;OUR PRODUCTS.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Our licensees pay us:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	an initial license fee for initial
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	set-up
</FONT>
	costs, technical support and
	advisory services that we provide until commercial launch; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	ongoing royalty payments based on a percentage of revenues generated from subscription fees and/or
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transactions
</FONT>
	of the game they service in the respective overseas markets.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In addition, if the license agreement is renewed, we typically negotiate a renewal license fee. The license agreements may be
	terminated in the event of bankruptcy or a material breach by either party, including, in our case, in the event the licensee fails to pay royalty fees in a timely manner.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	PRICING STRUCTURE AND PAYMENT SYSTEM
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Our overseas licensees generally develop, after consultation with us, a retail pricing structure for the users of the game they
	service in their respective markets. Pricing structures are determined primarily based on the cost of publishing and operating the game, the playing and payment patterns of the users, the pricing of competing games in a given market and the
	purchasing power parity of consumers in that market. Since the launch of Ragnarok Online in August 2002, we have tracked and accumulated user data generated from our user base, which provide us with an extensive database to analyze user patterns and
	establish pricing for other markets. The pricing for Ragnarok Online has remained generally stable in each of our markets since the respective dates of Ragnarok Online&#146;s commercial launch in those markets.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	In December 2006, we started to apply a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	system (or sale of virtual
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-game
</FONT>
	items model) as an additional business model by providing virtual item shops in the games where players can purchase a wide array of items to customize, personalize and enhance their characters and game
	playing experiences. The
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model has been introduced in all the countries and markets where Ragnarok Online is serviced. In addition, since January 2007, we have opened
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	free-to-play
</FONT>
</FONT>
	servers, which only apply the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model, in all the countries and markets where Ragnarok Online is serviced
	except Japan to encourage the players to download and play Ragnarok Online without paying subscription fees or buying playing time and to purchase
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-game
</FONT>
	items pursuant to our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model. We offer Ragnarok Online services with the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model only in all the countries and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	39
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage40"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	markets where Ragnarok Online is serviced, except the countries and markets where the subscription-based fee model is also applied such as Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau, and Thailand. The
	amount of revenue generated from
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transactions
</FONT>
	as a percentage of revenue varies by country and market. For example, in 2015, the approximate percentage of revenue derived from
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transactions
</FONT>
	accounted for 21.5% of total royalty revenues for Japan, and 76.5% of total royalty revenues for Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Since September 2007, we have been offering premium services as an additional revenue model, where players are offered certain
	additional features such as the faster accumulation of experience points or higher rates of item drops for additional fees during a specified period of time, in all the countries and markets where Ragnarok Online is serviced except Japan. The
	pricing for Ragnarok Online in Korea and in Japan, the United States and Canada, our principal overseas markets, are set forth below.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Korea
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Individual PC account users in Korea can choose from a number of alternative payment options, including charges made through
	mobile or fixed telephone service provider payment systems, prepaid cards, gift certificates, online credit card payments and bank transfers, to buy G Cash which can be used for any games we offer and convert G Cash to RO Points, the currency of the
	money used in Ragnarok Online which enable them to buy game items or subscribe to Premium Services. Internet caf&eacute; subscribers make payments through credit card or bank transfers. We pay a commission in the range of 1.4% to 15% to third
	parties to process payments. These third parties bear the delinquency risk associated with payments from users.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Subscription-based
</FONT>
	fee model
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	subscription-based
</FONT>
	fee model is currently applied only to Internet caf&eacute;s and not individual PC users in Korea. The following table sets forth our published pricing plans for Internet caf&eacute;s in
	Korea for Ragnarok Online access as of December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model in Korea since April 2007. The price range of
	each of the game items is between Won&nbsp;250 and Won&nbsp;29,800. There are certain game items which users can buy only at Internet caf&eacute;s.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	Premium Service model
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The Premium Service model was initially applied to
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	free-to-play
</FONT>
</FONT>
	servers in July 2008 and became available on all the servers in November 2010 when we ceased to apply the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	subscription-based
</FONT>
	fee model for individual PC users in Korea. We offer only one rate for the Premium Service model of Ragnarok Online in Korea and charge 5,500 RO Points for 30&nbsp;days of use. Premium
	Service users may further choose to use additional services as options, such as faster accumulation of experience points, higher rates of item drops, lower death penalty or a combination of such additional services for additional fees.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	40

<A NAME="eolPage41"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Japan
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	GungHo, our licensee in Japan, determines the pricing plan for Ragnarok Online in Japan. A majority of users in Japan typically
	pay to gain access to or purchase game items of Ragnarok Online with prepaid cards, such as WebMoney, among others, which can be purchased at convenience stores or retail game outlets, or online. In addition, credit cards are also a popular payment
	method. Mobile payment, which can be used for the payment of subscription-based fees and for payments of micro transactions, is increasingly popular in Japan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Subscription-based
</FONT>
	fee model
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Our licensee in Japan offers only one rate for Ragnarok Online and charges JPY1,500 per 30&nbsp;days of unlimited use.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We have applied a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model in Japan since December 2006. Game users buy
	GungHo Shop Points which enable them to buy game items or directly buy game items from the mobile item shop. The price range of the game items is between JPY50 and JPY1,500. The following table sets forth our licensee&#146;s published basic pricing
	for GungHo Shop Points in Japan as of December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	The United States
	and Canada
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Gravity Interactive, our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	wholly-owned
</FONT>
	subsidiary in the United
	States, determines the pricing plan for Ragnarok Online in the United States and Canada. Users pay through credit cards, wire and/or bank transfers, or mobile payment or online payment systems such as PayPal. Gravity Interactive ceased to apply the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	subscription-based
</FONT>
	fee model in April 2011.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	We have applied a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model in the United States and Canada since June
	2007. Game users buy points which enable them to buy game items in the price range between US$0.05 and US$20. The following table sets forth our licensee&#146;s published basic pricing for points of Ragnarok Online in the United States and Canada as
	of December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D64640D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	VIP Service fee model
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Although Ragnarok Online is offered based on the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	micro-transaction
</FONT>
	model in the United
	States and Canada, the VIP Service fee model, a premium service model, was introduced in April 2011 to provide users with enhanced game play as an option. The following table sets forth Gravity Interactive&#146;s published basic pricing for VIP
	Service for Ragnarok Online in the United States and Canada as of December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
