<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.3.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square or its authorized Sub-licensee shall provide comprehensive installation and maintenance support
	to End Users to assist them in their use of the Game including but not limited to Dream Square&#146;s maintenance contact window, on-line customer services, sufficient outbound bandwidth and circuits for operating business under this Agreement, and
	game servers required for online game operation.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Pricing for the Game shall be determined by Dream Square at its sole discretion, provided, however, that the
	Price for the Game shall not be unreasonably low or free compared to the market value thereof without prior agreement with Gravity.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Dream Square may provide End Users with such number of free game points and free accounts (&#147;Free Use&#148;) as may be
	reasonably necessary in the Game, for the purposes of the promotion, operation and advertisement of the Game, and may offer the Game a limited number of potential End Users for no charge during beta testing, and such offer shall not be subject to
	the royalty obligations under ARTICLE&nbsp;5.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	7
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage171"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 4: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square acknowledges and agrees that it shall not acquire any Intellectual Property Rights or other
	rights in the Original Game, except solely for the license expressly granted hereunder. Dream Square further acknowledges and agrees that Gravity shall be the copyright owner of the Game, and its use of the Games and any Intellectual Property Rights
	thereto pursuant to this Agreement shall inure solely to the benefit of Gravity. Provided, however, that Dream Square is entitled to register itself as the owner of the Game in China. As between the Parties, the Game shall still be the sole and
	exclusive property of Gravity. Dream Square agrees that it will not make any use of the Game upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement, and Gravity agrees that will not make any use of the source code of the Game during the Term. For the
	purpose of clarification, Gravity, after the termination or expiration of this Agreement, shall freely use and exploit the Game as a sole and exclusive owner.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	In the process of developing or distributing the Game, all the Intellectual Properties and materials developed
	by or for Dream Square which be developed without any contribution of the Licensed Property shall be the exclusive properties of Dream Square and, upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement, will be freely used by Dream Square without
	getting any approval.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square agrees to promptly notify Gravity of any activities or threatened activities of any person of
	which it becomes aware which may constitute an infringement, illegal use or misuse of the Intellectual Property Rights of Gravity. Dream Square shall use its commercially reasonable efforts to enforce or obtain protection of the Intellectual
	Property Rights with respect to the Game in the Territory during the Term of this Agreement and such best efforts shall include but not be limited to, taking all lawful actions necessary to shut down any servers operated by unauthorized third
	parties that provide End Users access to the Server Software. Reasonable out-of-pocket costs and expenses incurred pursuant to this Article 4.3 shall be borne by Dream Square. Gravity will provide necessary authorization certificate for the
	foregoing license.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 5: PAYMENT AND TAXES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	In consideration of all the rights granted to Dream Square hereunder, Dream Square shall pay Minimum Guarantee
	and Royalty Fee to Gravity as specified in this Article 5.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square shall pay to Gravity Minimum Guarantee of One and a half Million U.S dollars
	(USD&nbsp;$1,500,000) according to the following schedule:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	One Million U.S dollars (US$1,000,000) within thirty Business Days after the Effective Date of this Agreement
	upon Dream Square&#146;s receipt of a written invoice in such amount from Gravity;.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	A half million U.S dollars (US$500,000) within thirty Business Days after the date of Close Beta Test in the
	Territory upon Dream Square&#146;s receipt of a written invoice in such amount from Gravity.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage172"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Minimum Guarantee shall be credible against the amount of Royalty Fee which may
	accrue under this Agreement during the Two (2) years term commencing on Commercial Launch Date(the
<B>
<I>
	&#147;First Term&#148;
</I>
</B>
	),, and Dream Square only have to pay Gravity actual incremental Royalty Fee earned over the amount of the Minimum
	Guarantee for the First Term generated in connection with the Game in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	In consideration of all the rights granted to Dream Square hereunder, Dream Square shall pay to Gravity a
	royalty of Twenty percent (20%) of the Net Revenue after which have been actually received by Dream Square in the Territory (&#147;Royalty Fee&#148;). Once the accumulated sum of Gross Revenue from the Commercial Launch Date exceeds RMB
	200,000,000(two hundred million yuan), Dream Square shall pay Gravity Twenty-five percent (25%) of the Net Revenue as the Royalty Fee for the excess amount of Gross Revenue over RMB 200,000,000.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	All payments of Royalty Fee (the &#147;
<I>
<U>
	Royalty Payments
</U>
</I>
	&#148;) shall be computed by Dream Square
	on a monthly basis, and shall be due and payable by wire transfer to a bank account designated by the Gravity within thirty (30) Business Days after received by Dream Square from the distributors and receipt of the Gravity&#146;s invoice therefore.
	The local currency to U.S. dollar exchange rate for purpose of calculating the Net Revenue or Royalty Fee shall be the average of the selling and buying rates of the last Business Day of such month as reported by the People&#146;s Bank of China
	based upon the 12:00 noon (Beijing time).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:7%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The Royalty Payment shall not be paid until the accumulated
	Royalty Fees paid to Gravity reaches the amount of the accumulated Minimum Guarantee paid to Gravity. For the avoidance of doubt, Dream Square shall only pay the balance between the accumulated Royalty Payment and the accumulated Minimum Guarantee
	paid to Gravity if the accumulated Royalty Fee payable by Dream Square exceeds the accumulated Minimum Guarantee paid to Gravity by then.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square shall also provide Gravity with a royalty report for the Territory on a monthly basis
	(&#147;Monthly Report&#148;) within Fifteen (15) days after the end of the applicable month. Each Royalty Report shall contain detailed information concerning the calculation of Gross Sales Amount for the applicable month.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.6
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	All payments hereunder are tax inclusive and each party is responsible for its own tax duties. If any relevant
	tax authorities in the Territory require Dream Square to withhold the withholding tax on the payments to Gravity, Dream Square is allowed to withhold such tax from such payments. In the event that any amount is withheld for the tax payment under
	this Article 5.6, Dream Square shall inform Gravity of such payment and provide Gravity with a certification issued by the relevant tax authorities with respect to the relevant payment.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

	remain valid during the Term.

	doesn&#146;t infringe any Intellectual Property Rights of any third party; (iii) Dream Square&#146;s exercise of the license rights granted by Gravity pursuant to this Agreement will not infringe any rights of any third party.

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square represents and warrants that the parts of the Game developed by Dream&nbsp;Square doesn&#146;t
	infringe any Intellectual Property Rights of any third party.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Gravity agrees to indemnify and hold harmless for Dream Square from any kind of losses, costs, expenses or
	liabilities, including actual attorneys&#146; fees and costs of settlement, resulting from the breach by Gravity of its express warranties provided in Article 6.1 of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	6.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Dream Square agrees to indemnify and hold harmless for Gravity from any kind of losses, costs, expenses or
	liabilities, including actual attorneys&#146; fees and costs of settlement, resulting from the breach by Dream Square of its warranties given in this Agreement, including, without limitation that provided in Article 6.2.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	ARTICALE 7: LIABILITY
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	7.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	If a third-party infringement claim arising from the breach of Article 6.1 by Gravity is sustained in a final
	judgment from which no further appeal is taken or possible, then Gravity will pay or otherwise satisfy any monetary award entered against Dream Square as part of such final judgment, subject to the extent that such award is adjudged in such final
	judgment to arise from such infringement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

</P>

</P>

	Article 7.1, Gravity has to indemnify Dream Square all losses, costs, expenses or liabilities.

</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 8:
	CONFIDENTIALITY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	All Confidential Information disclosed by either Party under this Agreement shall be maintained in confidence
	by the receiving Party and shall not be used for any purpose other than explicitly granted under this Agreement. Each Party agrees that it shall provide Confidential Information received from the other Party only to its employees, consultants and
	advisors who need to know for the performance of this Agreement. The receiving Party shall be responsible for any breach of this Article by its employees, consultants and advisors.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	In the event that any Confidential Information, including but not limited to the source codes of the Game,
	Technical Information and financial information is disclosed or divulged to any third party who is not authorized to have access to or obtain such Confidential Information under this Agreement, the Parties shall cooperate with each other and exert
	their best efforts to protect or restore such Confidential Information from such unauthorized disclosure or divulgement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	The confidential obligation shall not apply, in the event that it can be shown by competent documents that the
	Confidential Information;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.3.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	becomes published or generally known to the public before or after the execution of this Agreement without any
	breach of this Agreement by the receiving Party;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.3.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	was known by the receiving Party prior to the date of disclosure to the receiving Party;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	8.3.3

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	either before or after the date of disclosure is lawfully disclosed to the receiving Party by a third party
	who is not under any confidentiality obligation to the disclosing Party for such information;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	is independently developed by or for the receiving Party without reference to or reliance upon the
	Confidential Information; or
</P>
</TD>

<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	is required to be disclosed by the receiving Party in accordance with the applicable laws and orders from the
	government or court; provided that, the receiving Party shall provide prior written notice of such disclosure to the providing Party and takes reasonable and lawful actions to avoid and/or minimize the degree of such disclosure.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

	the Commercial Launch Date (&#147;Term&#148;).

	expressed demurral in the form of a written notice at least thirty (30) days prior to the end of the Term.

	10: TERMINATION

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	This Agreement may be terminated upon a mutual written agreement of the Parties.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	10.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Either Party may terminate this Agreement upon Thirty (30) days prior written notice in the event that the
	other Party delays to perform any of its obligations hereunder and the breach of which constitutes a material breach of this Agreement and, if capable of remedy, has not remedied such default or failure within Thirty (30)days of receipt of such
	written notice. In addition, either Party shall remedy its default in or failure of complying with its obligation hereunder within 30 days of receipt of the other Party&#146;s written notice.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	10.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Each Party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other Party as well as their respective officers and
	employees from any and all claims, actions, liabilities, costs or expenses arising out of or in connection with any default by such Party in the performance of its obligations under this Agreement or due to such Party&#146;s breach of its
	representations and warranties set forth in this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	No termination of this Agreement shall affect the Parties&#146; rights or obligations that were incurred prior
	to the termination. The expiration or termination of this Agreement shall not affect the effectiveness of Articles 1,4,8,10.3, 10.4, 10.5, 11 and 13 which shall survive the expiration or termination of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	10.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Except as otherwise provided for this Agreement, upon termination or expiration of this Agreement, all rights
	granted to Dream Square hereunder shall immediately cease and shall revert to Gravity, and Dream Square shall immediately cease developing, servicing and/or selling of the Game and return to Gravity any and all software, technical documents and
	other materials or information provided by Gravity to Dream Square under this Agreement. Furthermore, Dream Square shall provide Gravity the source code of the Game after the termination of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	Notwithstanding&nbsp;the foregoing, Dream Square shall be given a period of three (3) months from the date of
	expiration or termination (
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Grace Period&#148;
</I>
</B>
	) to deal with, in accordance with the Applicable Laws, any refund, or request to the continuous use of the points, Game&#146;s virtual currency, Items, virtual services or other
	services in connection with the Game which the End Users purchased but not yet consumed.
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 10: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY AND FORCE MAJEURE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	11.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Neither Party shall be liable to the other Party for any indirect, consequential, incidental, punitive or
	special damages, whether based on breach of contract, tort (including negligence) or otherwise, and whether or not such Party has been advised of the possibility of such damage.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	11.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	In the event an act of war, fire, flood, an Act of God, or other occurrence beyond either party&#146;s
	reasonable control prevents or makes impracticable the performance by such party of its obligations under of this Agreement (a &#147;Force Majeure Event&#148;), then such non-performance by such party shall not be considered a breach of this
	Agreement and shall be excused, while the conditions of the Force Majeure Event prevail.&nbsp;If such party seeks to excuse or delay performance due to a Force Majeure Event, such party will provide detailed written notice to the other party of the
	nature and anticipated duration of the delay and shall use reasonable efforts to avoid or overcome the causes affecting performance.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	11.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	If the default, delay or failure to perform obligations under this Agreement arising from Force Majeure Event
	as set forth above in Article 11.2 exceeds sixty (60) days from the initial occurrence, either Party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement with a written notice to the other Party.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_64"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 12: SPECIAL PROVISIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	12.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	The Parties agree that the Original Agreement is terminated as of the Effective Date of this Agreement, and
	each party has no further obligations, duties or liabilities thereunder, and all the rights and obligations granted by the Original Agreement shall lapse after the Effective Date.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	12.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	The Parties agree that Gravity has no need to return the amount of Three hundred thousand United States
	Dollars (US$300,000) that has received from Dream Square under the Original Agreement, which shall be deemed as the paid-up amount of Minimum Guarantee by Dream Square under Article 5.2(1), and Dream Square shall pay Gravity seven hundred thousand
	U.S Dollars (US$700,000) actually.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	12.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	The Parties agree that the MG which is already paid to Gravity pursuant to relevant provisions stipulated in
	this Agreement is non-refundable. For the purposes of clarification, a half million U.S. Dollars (US$500,000) shall be due upon Dream Square&#146;s receipt of relevant invoice pursuant to 5.2(2) and Dream Square shall be obligated to pay such a half
	million U.S. Dollars (US$500,000) even if there is no Commercial Launch, except for this Agreement is early terminated attributable to the fault of Gravity.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 13: GENERAL PROVISIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	13.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	Unless otherwise agreed hereunder, either Party may not assign, delegate or otherwise transfer in any manner
	any of its rights, obligations and responsibilities under this Agreement, without prior written consent of the other Party. For the purposes of clarification, Gravity agrees that Dream Square has right to assign all or any part of its rights and
	obligations under this Agreement to its Affiliates with the prior approval of Gravity.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	13.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	It is understood and agreed by the Parties that this Agreement does not create a fiduciary relationship
	between them, and that nothing in this Agreement is intended to constitute either Party an agent, legal representative, subsidiary, joint venture, employee or servant of the other for any purpose whatsoever.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	If any kind of notices, consents, approvals, or waivers are to be given hereunder, such notices, consents,
	approvals or waivers shall be in writing, shall be properly addressed to the Party to whom such notice, consent, approval or waiver is directed, and shall be either hand delivered to such Party or sent by certified mail, return receipt requested, or
	sent by FedEx, DHL or comparable international courier service, or by telephone, facsimile or electronic mail (in either case with written confirmation in any of the other accepted forms of notice) to the following addresses or such addresses as may
	be furnished by the respective Parties from time to time:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	Any dispute, controversy or difference arising between the Parties out of or in relation to this Agreement or
	for the breach thereof shall be resolved exclusively by arbitration in Singapore, in accordance with Arbitration Rules of the Singapore Commercial Arbitration Board and under the laws of Singapore. The award rendered by the arbitrator shall be final
	and binding upon both Parties concerned. Notwithstanding the foregoing provision, the Parties shall have the right to bring judicial proceedings to obtain preliminary injunctive relief at any time, provided that such preliminary injunctive relief
	shall be subject to final arbitral decisions.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	17
</P>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.57
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	FOURTH AMENDMENT TO THE RAGNAROK ONLINE GAME
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LICENSE AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	This
	Fourth Amendment (this &#147;Amendment&#148;) is made and entered into on August&nbsp;27
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2015 (hereinafter called &#147;Effective Date&#148;), by and between
<B>
	Gravity Co., Ltd.
</B>
	(hereinafter referred to as &#147;Licensor&#148;) a corporation duly organised and existing under the laws of the Republic of Korea (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Korea&#148;) and having its offices at (Sangam-Dong, Nuritkum Square R&amp;D
	Tower15F), 396, World Cup buk-ro, Mapo-Gu, Seoul, Korea (hereinafter to as &#147;Korea&#148;) and
<B>
	PT. LYTO DATARINDO FORTUNA.,
</B>
	a corporation having its principal place of business at Jalan Arteri Pos Pengumben NO.8 RT 005/08 Kelurahan
	Sukabumi Selatan Kecamatan Kebon Jeruk Kota Administrasi, JAKARTA BARAT 11560 INDONESIA. (hereinafter called &#147;Licensee&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	RECITALS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Licensor and Licensee (&#147;Parties&#148; collectively) entered into a Ragnarok Online Game License Agreement (&#147;The
	Agreement&#148;), dated on February&nbsp;27
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2010.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered
	into a First Amendment to the Ragnarok Online Game License Agreement (&#147;First Amendment&#148;), dated on October&nbsp;1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	, 2011.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered into Second Amendment to the Ragnarok Online Game License Agreement (&#147;Second Amendment&#148;), dated on
	February&nbsp;27
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2013.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered into Third Amendment to
	the Ragnarok Online Game License Agreement (&#147;Third Amendment&#148;), dated on February&nbsp;27
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, this Amendment is supplemental to the Agreement, and the Parties enter into this Amendment, to amend certain provisions in the
	Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties hereto desires to amend The Agreement as specified below.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	AGREEMENT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	NOW,
	THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the mutual premises and covenants contained herein, Parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	1. Renewal Term
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Parties agreed to extend the Agreement for One (1)&nbsp;year from the expiration date of The Agreement with conditions stated in this
	Amendment. The newly extended term of The Agreement shall be from August&nbsp;27
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2015 to August&nbsp;26
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2016 without any License Fee.
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage182"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	2. Continuing Effectiveness of The Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Except as expressly set forth herein, this Amendment shall not by implication or otherwise alter, modify, amend or in any way affect any of the terms,
	conditions, obligations, covenants or agreements contained in The Agreement amended by its First Amendment, Second Amendment and Third Amendment, all of which are ratified and affirmed in all respects and shall continue in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</B>
	, Parties have executed this Amendment on the date first above written.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:24PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the Parties hereto desires to amend the Original Agreement amended by Prior
	Amendments(hereinafter referred to as &#147;
<B>
	The Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) as specified below.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE,
</B>
	in consideration of
	the mutual premises and covenants contained herein, Licensor and Licensee agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
<B>
	Renewal Term
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:3%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree to extend the term of The Agreement for two (2) years (&#147;Renewed Term&#148;) from September 29, 2015 with
	conditions stated below in this Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage184"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:3%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The newly extended term of The Agreement shall be from September 29, 2015 to
	September 28, 2017 without any License Fee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
<B>
	Renewal Condition
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
<B>
	Royalty Payment
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:3%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Licensee shall pay to Licensor as Royalty Payments Forty percent (40%) of the Net Revenue during the Renewed Term. All other
	Royalty Payment and Report conditions shall remain the same as set out in The Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Continuing
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
<B>
	Effectiveness of the Original Agreement
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Except as expressly set forth herein, this Amendment shall not by implication or otherwise alter, modify, amend or in any way
	affect any of the terms, conditions, obligations, covenants or agreements contained in The Agreement, all of which are ratified and affirmed in all respects and shall continue in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	All the Articles of The Agreement amended by this Amendment shall be effective and applicable on and from Effective Date of
	this Amendment as said above.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:2%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	Exhibit 4.59

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Tenth Amendment
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	To The
	Exclusive Ragnarok Online License and Distribution Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	This AMENDMENT
</B>
	(&#147;this Amendment&#148;) is made
<I>
</I>
	and
	entered into on this 16
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of November, 2015 (hereinafter referred to as
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Amendment Date&#148;
</I>
</B>
	) by and between
<B>
	Gravity Co., Ltd
</B>
	(hereinafter referred to as
	&#147;Licensor&#148;) and
<B>
	Gravity Interactive, Inc.
</B>
	(hereinafter referred to as &#147;Licensee&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	RECITALS
</U>
	:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Licensor and Licensee (&#147;Parties&#148; collectively) entered into the Exclusive Ragnarok Online License and Distribution
	Agreement (&#147;the Original Agreement&#148;), dated January 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	, 2006.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the Parties has entered into the amendments to the Original Agreement (
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Amendments&#148;
</I>
</B>
	) Nine times to
	amend certain terms and conditions of the Original Agreement(the Original Agreement amended by Amendments until now is hereinafter referred to as
<B>
<I>
	&#147;The Agreement&#148;
</I>
</B>
	);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, both Parties to The Agreement now desire to amend The Agreement as set forth below;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	AGREEMENT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	NOW;
	THEREFORE,
</B>
	in consideration of the mutual promises and covenants contained herein, Licensor and Licensee agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	1.
	Territory
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The Article 1.12 of The Agreement shall be amended as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	1.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Territory&#148; shall mean the following territories:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(a) United States of America
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(b) Canada
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(c) Australia
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(d) New Zealand
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(e) India
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage186"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(f) Singapore
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(g) Malaysia
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(h) Middle East and North Africa region (UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, Oman, Lebanon, Mauritania, Egypt,
	Algeria, Morocco, and Tunisia)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(i) Philippines
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(j) The Russian Federation, the CIS countries (Armenia, Azerbaijan, Kyrgyzstan, Kazakhstan, Moldova, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan,
	Uzbekistan), Georgia, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(k) South America area except Brazil (including, but not limited to,
	Guyana, Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, Bolivia, Republic of Suriname, Argentina, Ecuador, Uruguay, Chile, Colombia, Paraguay, Peru)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	All the Articles of The Agreement amended by this Amendment shall be effective and applicable on and from the Amendment Date
	defined above, and any of them shall not be construed or regarded to be retroactively effective.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
<B>
	Continuing Effectiveness of the Agreement
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Except as expressly set forth herein, this Amendment shall not by implication or otherwise alter, modify, amend or in any way
	affect any of the terms, conditions, obligations, covenants, or agreements contained in The Agreement, all of which are ratified and affirmed in all respects and shall continue in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF,
</B>
	the Parties have executed this Amendment on the day and year first
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	above-written.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:24PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage187"></A>
<A NAME="D64640DEX460_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_6"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.60
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	FIFTH AMENDMENT TO EXCLUSIVE RAGNAROK
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AUTHORIZATION AND DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	This Fifth Amendment (hereinafter referred to as &#147;this Amendment&#148;) is made and entered into on this 2
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	day of March, 2016, by and between Gravity Co., Ltd., (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Gravity&#148;), a corporation duly organized under the laws of the Republic of Korea, having its principal
	offices at 15F Nuritkum Square R&amp;D Tower, Worldcup Bukro 396. Sangam-Dong, Mapo-Gu, Seoul, 121-270, Korea and Level Up! Interactive Ltda (hereinafter referred to as &#147;LUISA&#148;), a corporation having its principal place of business at
	Avenida Jabaquara, 3060 &#150; 8o. andar, 04046-000, in the city of Sao Paulo, State of Sao Paulo, enrolled with the Ministry of Finance Tax Registration Number under CNPJ/MF 06.142.151/0001-60.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	RECITALS
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	,
	Gravity and LUISA (&#147;Parties&#148; collectively) entered into an Exclusive Ragnarok Authorization and Distribution Agreement (&#147;The Agreement&#148;), dated March 2
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	, 2009.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered into a First Amendment to Exclusive Ragnarok Authorization and Distribution Agreement (&#147;First
	Amendment&#148;), dated January 17
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2011.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered into a
	Second Amendment to Exclusive Ragnarok Authorization and Distribution Agreement (&#147;Second Amendment&#148;), dated August 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	, 2011.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered into a Third Amendment to Exclusive Ragnarok Authorization and Distribution Agreement (&#147;Third
	Amendment&#148;), dated October 29
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	, 2012.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties entered into a
	Fourth Amendment to Exclusive Ragnarok Authorization and Distribution Agreement (&#147;Fourth Amendment&#148;), dated March 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	, 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Parties hereto desire to renew The Agreement as specified below.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the mutual promise and covenants contained herein, Parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	I. Term
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Parties agreed to extend The
	Agreement for One (1) year from the expiration of The Agreement extended by the First, Third and Fourth Amendment with conditions stated in this Amendment. The newly extended term of The Agreement shall be from March 2
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	, 2016 to March 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	, 2017.
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage188"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	II. Authorization Fee
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	LUISA shall pay to Gravity a non-recoupable and non-refundable renewal Authorization fee (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Authorization
	Fee&#148;) in the amount of Twenty five Thousand US Dollars (US$25,000) within Fifteen (15) calendar days after the effective date of this Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	III. Continuing Effectiveness of the Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Except as expressly set forth herein, this Amendment shall not by implication or otherwise alter, modify, amend or in any way affect any of
	the terms, conditions, obligations, covenants or agreements contained in The Agreement amended by its amendments, all of which are ratified and affirmed in all respects and shall continue in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</B>
	, Parties have executed this Amendment on the date first above written.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_7"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.61
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	EXCLUSIVE RAGNAROK ONLINE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:14PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LICENSE AND
	DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	This License Agreement (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Agreement&#148;) is made and entered into on this 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	day of April, 2016, (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Effective Date&#148;), by and between
<B>
	Gravity Co., Ltd.,
</B>
	a corporation duly organized and existing under the laws of the Republic of
	Korea (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Korea&#148;) and having its principle office at 15F, Nuritkum Square R&amp;D Tower, Worldcup Buk-Ro 396, Sangam-Dong, Mapo-Gu, Seoul, 03925, Korea (hereinafter referred to as &#147;
<B>
	Licensor
</B>
	&#148;), and
<B>
	Electronics Extreme Ltd.,
</B>
	a corporation duly organized and existing under the laws of Thailand and having its principal office at 20-99 Thanawat Building, 8
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	Fl., Soi Chulakasem 6
	Ngamwongwan Rd.,Bangkhen, Nonthaburi, 11000, Thailand (hereinafter referred to as &#147;
<B>
	Licensee
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	RECITALS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Licensor has developed, and owns all rights in, computer programs of PC online game &#147;RAGNAROK ONLINE&#148; (hereinafter referred to
	as &#147;Game&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Licensee desires to enter into an exclusive license agreement with Licensor under the mutual terms and
	conditions specified herein pursuant to which Licensee will make the Game available to End Users in the Territory specified below; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Licensor desires to grant such license to Licensee under the mutual terms and conditions herein, specified below.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the mutual promises and covenants contained herein and for other good and valuable consideration, the Parties
	hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 1: DEFINITIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The terms defined in this Article shall have the meaning ascribed to them herein whenever they are used in this Agreement, unless otherwise clearly
	indicated by the context.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Agreement&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall have the meanings set forth in the introductory section of this agreement, and
	all annexes, amendments and supplements hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Billing System&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the software and hardware necessary to calculate the Gross
	Sales Amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Business Days&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean any days other than Saturday, Sunday and any other day designated as a legal
	holiday by the Republic of Korea or Thailand government.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Client Program&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean a software program that runs on End
	Users&#146; personal computer and allow End Users to access the Servers for playing the Local Version.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage190"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Closed Beta Test&#148;
</I>
</B>
	or
<B>
<I>
	&#147;CBT&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the secured and
	non-public testing of the beta version of the Local Version by a selected group of end users prior to the OBT, which is to be performed by Licensee in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Commercial Launch Date&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean when Licensee commercially launches the Local Version for the first time, in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Commercial Service&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean offering the Local Version to the End Users after Commercial Launch Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Confidential Information&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean all materials, know-how, software or other similar types of information including, but not
	limited to, proprietary information and materials regarding a Party&#146;s technology, products, business information or objectives, including the software for the Game, the Local Version and Technical Information as defined in this Agreement, as
	well as all information which is designated as confidential in writing by the providing Party or which is the type that is customarily considered to be confidential information by persons engaged in similar activities.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;End Users&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the users of the Local Version in the Territory, who are offered or provided access to the Local Version
	through a network game service system established and operated by Licensee with individually assigned ID Numbers for each End User.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&#147;
</B>
<B>
<I>
	Game
</I>
</B>
<B>
	&#148;
</B>
	shall mean the Korean or English language version of massively multiplayer online role-playing game played
	by using the Client Program (
<B>
<I>
	&#147;MMORPG&#148;
</I>
</B>
	) known as &#147;Ragnarok Online&#148; and shall further be defined as including any modified or advanced version of the Game distributed by Licensor for error correcting, updating or
	debugging purpose, under the same title. Any subtitled version, series or Sequel to the Game, or other language version of the Game, or other type or genre of the Game ( including but not limited to i) mobile game, ii) arcade game, iii) video game,
	iv) social network game provided through social networks including, without limitation, Facebook, Google, Twitter, and v) other genre of online game than MMORPG ) which may be developed or distributed by Licensor shall be clearly excluded from the
	scope of the Game and, if Licensee wishes to service specific kind(s) of them, additional separate license agreement shall be executed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Game Database&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean all the data collected and used to operate the Local Version, including, but not limited to the
	personal identification information of End Users and game-play information such as character appearances(e.g., face/body), character attributes(e.g., level/ experience, point/skill), item inventories and statistics in relation to End Users&#146;
	playing the Local Version
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Game Points&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean cyber points upon Prepaid Cards or accounts of End Users.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Gross Sales Amount&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the total sales revenue recognized by Licensee, without any deduction, in accordance with
	generally accepted accounting principle in the Territory that is generated from the sale and distribution of the Local Version in the Territory, including but not limited to the sales of Prepaid Cards, provided that the Gross Sales Amount shall not
	include the following deductions:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(a) value added tax (VAT), to the extent that the total amount of such taxes do not exceed Seven percent
	(&nbsp;7&nbsp;%&nbsp;) of the Gross Sales Amount;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	(b) any amount of repayment to End Users, subject to Licensor&#146;s approval, according to the
	policy of Licensee or applicable laws or regulations in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage191"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;ID Number&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean an identification number assigned to each End User, with
	which such End User can access and use the network game service system established and operated by Licensee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Intellectual
	Property&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean all patents, designs, utility models, copyrights, know-how, trade secrets, trademarks, service mark, trade dress and any other intellectual property rights, whether registered or not, in or related to the Game, the
	Local Version and/or Technical Information.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Local Language&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean Thai language as used in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Local Version&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the Game provided in the Local Language.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Minimum Royalty&#148;
</I>
</B>
	or
<B>
<I>
	&#147;MG&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the minimum guaranteed Royalty paid to Licensor in advance by
	Licensee. The Royalty shall be deemed as fully paid until the accumulated Royalty reaches the Minimum Royalty paid to Licensor. For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee shall actually pay the Royalty after the accumulated Royalty exceeds the Minimum
	Royalty.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Open Beta Test&#148;
</I>
</B>
	or
<B>
<I>
	&#147;OBT&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the secured testing of the beta version of the Local
	Version by offering the Local Version to the general public for free trial for a limited period of time prior to the Commercial Launch Date of the Local Version, which is to be performed by Licensee in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Parties&#148; and &#147;Party&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean Licensor and Licensee, collectively and individually, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Prepaid Cards&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the tangible or intangible card containing a unique code or other unique identifying information
	purchased by End Users to access the Local Version.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Private Server&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the server privately established and
	operated by a third party without any authorization from Licensor or Licensee for providing end users with a game identical or similar to the Game or the Local Version.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Sequel&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean any new MMORPG based on the Game or the Local Version that (i)&nbsp;reflects a substantially different
	gameplay than the Game or the Local Version, (ii)&nbsp;does not interoperate with the existing Game or the Local Version, (iii)&nbsp;is capable of being played as a MMORPG separate and apart from the Game or the Local Version, and (iv)&nbsp;is
	commercially launched as a separate MMORPG apart from the Game or the Local Version.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Servers&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the servers
	established, installed and operated by Licensee within the Territory only for the service of the Local Version to End Users in the Territory.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Sublicensing&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean a license granting a portion or all of the rights, to a third party by Licensee, which has been
	granted to Licensee under this Agreement. When used as a verb, &#147;Sublicense&#148; means to engage in Sublicensing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Technical
	Information&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean the software, know-how, data, test result, layouts, artwork, processes, scripts, concepts and other technical information on or in relation to the Game and/or the Local Version, and the installation, operation,
	maintenance, service and use thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage192"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:11PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Territory&#148;
</I>
</B>
	shall mean Thailand.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:12PT; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ARTICLE 2: GRANT OF LICENSE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	Licensor hereby grants to Licensee, and Licensee hereby accepts from Licensor, under the terms and conditions set forth
	in this Agreement, a non-transferable, royalty-bearing and exclusive license to do the followings within the Territory during the period of this Agreement;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	To maintain and operate the Local Version within the Territory, and to grant End Users to access such Local Version
	within the Territory;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	To reproduce, in object code form only, and to market, distribute and sell to End Users or potential End Users, the
	Client Program in CD-Rom medium format or through the Internet;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT">
	To generate, market, promote, sell and distribute Prepaid Cards in accordance with market demands; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL; FONT-SIZE:11PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
